column4: I see theres still severe video tearing in 9.04 too with DVDs. *sigh*
it seems as if exaile is working with youtube... how weird...
how can Ig et amarok 2 to respond the same way?
what are you trying to do?
don't mind him... its just different, no features are lost
- I can't get youtube audio and amarok2 to work at the same time. with amarok1 I had to change an engine setting. But now with amarok2 I cant find it.
- then how can I change engine settings in amarok2?
install the xine pulse plugin, and ensure phonon is using xine
- the xine pulse plugin... so that magically gives me more amarok2 settings to change the engine? or what?
Amarok2 uses KDE4 settings... thus it uses Phonon... so if the phonon backend is using xine that has a pulse plugin, it won't complain with Flash as that too uses Pulse as of 10.x
idk, that's how I set up phonon, and I never had issues... except the various plasma leaks
I told you how to fix amarok2, either do what I said or stop asking the same question.
